    About

    What's goin' on, tech fam! Welcome to Tinted Tech, your chill zone for all things JavaScript, cloud stuff, and even some fancy Artificial Intelligence (AI). I'm here to break down these powerful tools in a way that makes sense, even if you're a total beginner.

    No matter your skill level, this is a judgement-free zone. We'll learn by doing, with clear instructions and a healthy dose of laughter along the way. So grab your favorite beverage, put on your comfy clothes, and get ready to dive into the exciting world of tech with a fresh perspective. Let's see what cool stuff we can create together!
